description:
Milk’s favorite fairy tale growing up was Snow White- after eating an apple, she now is Snow White unless Ramune can cure her before the sun goes down!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hashire Lamuness! Douwa no Mori no Wana
Run Lamuness! The Traps in the Forest of Fairy Tales
走れラムネス! 童話の森のワナ
